summary: I HAVE A 2002 TRAILBLAZER WITH A AIR CONDITION PROBLEM THE TRUCK  HAS BEEN TO THE DEALERSHIP TWICE. THE DEALERSHIP HAS TOLD US TO SPRAY THE TRAILBLAZER WITH LYSOL IN THE AIR CONDITION VENTS IN ODER TO KEEP THE MELDOW SMELL FROM COMING BACK INTO THE TRUCK ,THEY ARE REFUSING TO REPLACE THE AIR CONDITION.
